entity.name: Authorizable
entity.description: Almost empty interface so users can still use Pheno model, where ObservationElement implements Authorizable, without being bothered by row-level security.

field.name: canRead
field.description: You can ignore this field and leave it empty. It is here so code dependent on the full Authorizable interface still compiles when the empty one is chosen.

field.name: canWrite
field.description: You can ignore this field and leave it empty. It is here so code dependent on the full Authorizable interface still compiles when the empty one is chosen.

field.name: owns
field.description: You can ignore this field and leave it empty. It is here so code dependent on the full Authorizable interface still compiles when the empty one is chosen.
